title: BRIEF-ChromaDex Corp Sees Q4 2017 Revenue About $7.5 Mln
text:
February 12, 2018 / 11:36 AM / Updated 6 minutes ago BRIEF-ChromaDex Corp Sees Q4 2017 Revenue About $7.5 Mln Reuters Staff 
Feb 12 (Reuters) - ChromaDex Corp: * ORATION REPORTS PRELIMINARY 2017 RESULTS * SEES Q4 2017 REVENUE ABOUT $7.5 MILLION * SEES FY 2017 REVENUE ABOUT $21.2 MILLION 
* AN OPERATING LOSS FOR Q4 OF 2017 IS EXPECTED TO BE IN A RANGE OF $8.5 MILLION TO $9.5 MILLION 
* ‍FOR FULL YEAR 2017, OPERATING LOSS FROM CONTINUING OPERATIONS IS EXPECTED TO BE IN A RANGE OF $16 MILLION TO $17 MILLION​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
